Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Heterin-1 (natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence  is 73.2% similar tofly defensin.  Active against  B. megaterium AB 90008; M. luteus AB2010179 (MIC 4 uM); S. aureus AB 94004 (MIC 42 uM);  E. coli DH5alpha, P. fluorences PF, P. putida PP, E. cloacae AB 2010162, S. enterica AB 2010185 (MIC 15-40 uM). Provided by Xiuqing Wang.
Literature Information.Author: Wu S, Nie Y, Zeng XC, Cao H, Zhang L, Zhou L, Yang Y, Luo X, Liu Y.2014
Literature Information.Title: Genomic and functional characterization of three new venom peptides from the scorpion Heterometrus spinifer
